## Installation
1. Install AIPW from GitHub

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("yqzhong7/AIPW")
```

2. Install SuperLearner 

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("SuperLearner")
```

3. Install sl3

```{r, eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("tlverse/sl3")
```

## Setup for analyses
```{r setup}
library(AIPW)
```
